tool_description: Detailed Threads MOBILE API.  You can also use endpoints that require authorization.
name: Threads by Meta | Threads, an Instagram APP (Detailed)
title: Threads by Meta | Threads, an Instagram APP (Detailed)
tool_name: Threads by Meta | Threads, an Instagram APP (Detailed)

api_list.name: Login (Get Auth Token)
api_list.description: Returns auth token.  You can make requests that require auth with this token. If it asks for a verification code for your account, you will not be logged in.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://threads-by-meta-threads-an-instagram-app-detailed.p.rapidapi.com/login"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "threads-by-meta-threads-an-instagram-app-detailed.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
